title: Three bed villa with pool and staff accommodation near Hikkaduwa
details:
This lovely villa is well situated being just 4km inland from Hikkaduwa and 30 minutes drive from Galle.

With three en-suite bedrooms and separate staff accommodation it would make a fabulous family home, holiday home or holiday rental.

The well-maintained garden, which extends to approximately one and half acres, has a swimming pool and a pool pavilion with tranquil views out over the surrounding paddy fields.
